trans-unit.source: Install and use Giraph on Hadoop clusters in HDInsight | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Install and use Giraph on Hadoop clusters in HDInsight | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to customize HDInsight cluster with Giraph.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to customize HDInsight cluster with Giraph.

trans-unit.source: You'll use a Script Action configuration option to use a script to install Giraph.
trans-unit.target: You'll use a Script Action configuration option to use a script to install Giraph.

trans-unit.source: Install Giraph on HDInsight Hadoop clusters, and use Giraph to process large-scale graphs
trans-unit.target: Install Giraph on HDInsight Hadoop clusters, and use Giraph to process large-scale graphs

trans-unit.source: You can install Giraph on any type of cluster in Hadoop on Azure HDInsight by using **Script Action** cluster customization.
trans-unit.target: You can install Giraph on any type of cluster in Hadoop on Azure HDInsight by using **Script Action** cluster customization.

trans-unit.source: Script Action lets you run scripts to customize a cluster, only when the cluster is being created.
trans-unit.target: Script Action lets you run scripts to customize a cluster, only when the cluster is being created.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Customize HDInsight clusters using Script Action][hdinsight-cluster-customize].
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Customize HDInsight clusters using Script Action][hdinsight-cluster-customize].

trans-unit.source: In this topic, you will learn how to install Giraph by using Script Action.
trans-unit.target: In this topic, you will learn how to install Giraph by using Script Action.

trans-unit.source: Once you have installed Giraph, you'll also learn how to use Giraph for most typical applications, which is to process large-scale graphs.
trans-unit.target: Once you have installed Giraph, you'll also learn how to use Giraph for most typical applications, which is to process large-scale graphs.

trans-unit.source: Install Giraph on HDInsight clusters
trans-unit.target: Install Giraph on HDInsight clusters

trans-unit.source: What is Giraph?
trans-unit.target: What is Giraph?

trans-unit.source: Apache Giraph allows you to perform graph processing by using Hadoop, and can be used with Azure HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Apache Giraph allows you to perform graph processing by using Hadoop, and can be used with Azure HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Graphs model relationships between objects, such as the connections between routers on a large network like the Internet, or relationships between people on social networks (sometimes referred to as a social graph).
trans-unit.target: Graphs model relationships between objects, such as the connections between routers on a large network like the Internet, or relationships between people on social networks (sometimes referred to as a social graph).

trans-unit.source: Graph processing allows you to reason about the relationships between objects in a graph, such as:
trans-unit.target: Graph processing allows you to reason about the relationships between objects in a graph, such as:

trans-unit.source: Identifying potential friends based on your current relationships.
trans-unit.target: Identifying potential friends based on your current relationships.

trans-unit.source: Identifying the shortest route between two computers in a network.
trans-unit.target: Identifying the shortest route between two computers in a network.

trans-unit.source: Calculating the page rank of webpages.
trans-unit.target: Calculating the page rank of webpages.

trans-unit.source: How do I install Giraph?
trans-unit.target: How do I install Giraph?

trans-unit.source: A sample script to install Giraph on an HDInsight cluster is available from a read-only Azure storage blob at [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1).
trans-unit.target: A sample script to install Giraph on an HDInsight cluster is available from a read-only Azure storage blob at [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1).

trans-unit.source: This section provides instructions on how to use the sample script while provisioning the cluster by using the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: This section provides instructions on how to use the sample script while provisioning the cluster by using the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The sample script works only with HDInsight cluster version 3.1.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The sample script works only with HDInsight cluster version 3.1.

trans-unit.source: For more information on HDInsight cluster versions, see [HDInsight cluster versions](hdinsight-component-versioning.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information on HDInsight cluster versions, see [HDInsight cluster versions](hdinsight-component-versioning.md).

trans-unit.source: Start provisioning a cluster by using the **CUSTOM CREATE** option, as described at [Provisioning a cluster using custom options](hdinsight-provision-clusters.md#portal).
trans-unit.target: Start provisioning a cluster by using the **CUSTOM CREATE** option, as described at [Provisioning a cluster using custom options](hdinsight-provision-clusters.md#portal).

trans-unit.source: On the **Script Actions** page of the wizard, click **add script action** to provide details about the script action, as shown below:
trans-unit.target: On the **Script Actions** page of the wizard, click **add script action** to provide details about the script action, as shown below:

trans-unit.source: Use Script Action to customize a cluster
trans-unit.target: Use Script Action to customize a cluster

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Value

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: Name

trans-unit.source: Specify a name for the script action.
trans-unit.target: Specify a name for the script action.

trans-unit.source: For example, Install Giraph.
trans-unit.target: For example, Install Giraph.

trans-unit.source: Script URI
trans-unit.target: Script URI

trans-unit.source: Specify the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to the script that is invoked to customize the cluster.
trans-unit.target: Specify the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to the script that is invoked to customize the cluster.

trans-unit.source: For example, https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1
trans-unit.target: For example, https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/giraphconfigactionv01/giraph-installer-v01.ps1

trans-unit.source: Node Type
trans-unit.target: Node Type

trans-unit.source: Specify the nodes on which the customization script is run.
trans-unit.target: Specify the nodes on which the customization script is run.

trans-unit.source: You can choose All nodes, Head nodes only, or Worker nodes only.
trans-unit.target: You can choose All nodes, Head nodes only, or Worker nodes only.

trans-unit.source: Parameters
trans-unit.target: Parameters

trans-unit.source: Specify the parameters, if required by the script.
trans-unit.target: Specify the parameters, if required by the script.

trans-unit.source: The script to install Giraph does not require any parameters, so you can leave this blank.
trans-unit.target: The script to install Giraph does not require any parameters, so you can leave this blank.

trans-unit.source: You can add more than one script action to install multiple components on the cluster.
trans-unit.target: You can add more than one script action to install multiple components on the cluster.

trans-unit.source: After you have added the scripts, click the checkmark to start provisioning the cluster.
trans-unit.target: After you have added the scripts, click the checkmark to start provisioning the cluster.

trans-unit.source: How do I use Giraph in HDInsight?
trans-unit.target: How do I use Giraph in HDInsight?

trans-unit.source: We use the SimpleShortestPathsComputation example to demonstrate the basic Pregel implementation for finding the shortest path between objects in a graph.
trans-unit.target: We use the SimpleShortestPathsComputation example to demonstrate the basic Pregel implementation for finding the shortest path between objects in a graph.

trans-unit.source: Use the following steps to upload the sample data and the sample jar, run a job by using the SimpleShortestPathsComputation example, and then view the results.
trans-unit.target: Use the following steps to upload the sample data and the sample jar, run a job by using the SimpleShortestPathsComputation example, and then view the results.

trans-unit.source: Upload a sample data file to Azure Blob storage.
trans-unit.target: Upload a sample data file to Azure Blob storage.

trans-unit.source: On your local workstation, create a new file named **tiny_graph.txt**.
trans-unit.target: On your local workstation, create a new file named **tiny_graph.txt**.

trans-unit.source: It should contain the following lines:
trans-unit.target: It should contain the following lines:

trans-unit.source: Upload the tiny_graph.txt file to the primary storage for your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Upload the tiny_graph.txt file to the primary storage for your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: For instructions on how to upload data, see [Upload data for Hadoop jobs in HDInsight](hdinsight-upload-data.md).
trans-unit.target: For instructions on how to upload data, see [Upload data for Hadoop jobs in HDInsight](hdinsight-upload-data.md).

trans-unit.source: This data describes a relationship between objects in a directed graph, by using the format [source\_id, source\_value,[[dest\_id], [edge\_value],...]].
trans-unit.target: This data describes a relationship between objects in a directed graph, by using the format [source\_id, source\_value,[[dest\_id], [edge\_value],...]].

trans-unit.source: Each line represents a relationship between a **source\_id** object and one or more **dest\_id** objects.
trans-unit.target: Each line represents a relationship between a **source\_id** object and one or more **dest\_id** objects.

trans-unit.source: The **edge\_value** (or weight) can be thought of as the strength or distance of the connection between **source_id** and **dest\_id**.
trans-unit.target: The **edge\_value** (or weight) can be thought of as the strength or distance of the connection between **source_id** and **dest\_id**.

trans-unit.source: Drawn out, and using the value (or weight) as the distance between objects, the above data might look like this:
trans-unit.target: Drawn out, and using the value (or weight) as the distance between objects, the above data might look like this:

trans-unit.source: tiny_graph.txt drawn as circles with lines of varying distance between
trans-unit.target: tiny_graph.txt drawn as circles with lines of varying distance between

trans-unit.source: Run the SimpleShortestPathsComputation example.
trans-unit.target: Run the SimpleShortestPathsComputation example.

trans-unit.source: Use the following Azure PowerShell cmdlets to run the example by using the tiny_graph.txt file as input.
trans-unit.target: Use the following Azure PowerShell cmdlets to run the example by using the tiny_graph.txt file as input.

trans-unit.source: This requires that you have installed and configured [Azure PowerShell][powershell-install].
trans-unit.target: This requires that you have installed and configured [Azure PowerShell][powershell-install].

trans-unit.source: In the above example, replace **clustername** with the name of your HDInsight cluster that has Giraph installed.
trans-unit.target: In the above example, replace **clustername** with the name of your HDInsight cluster that has Giraph installed.

trans-unit.source: View the results.
trans-unit.target: View the results.

trans-unit.source: Once the job has finished, the results will be stored in two output files in the __wasb:///example/out/shotestpaths__ folder.
trans-unit.target: Once the job has finished, the results will be stored in two output files in the __wasb:///example/out/shotestpaths__ folder.

trans-unit.source: The files are called __part-m-00001__ and __part-m-00002__.
trans-unit.target: The files are called __part-m-00001__ and __part-m-00002__.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to download and view the output:
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to download and view the output:

trans-unit.source: This will create the __example/output/shortestpaths__ directory structure in the current directory on your workstation, and download the two output files to that location.
trans-unit.target: This will create the __example/output/shortestpaths__ directory structure in the current directory on your workstation, and download the two output files to that location.

trans-unit.source: Use the __Cat__ cmdlet to display the contents of the files:
trans-unit.target: Use the __Cat__ cmdlet to display the contents of the files:

trans-unit.source: The output should appear similar to the following:
trans-unit.target: The output should appear similar to the following:

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: See also

trans-unit.source: [Install and use Spark on HDInsight clusters][hdinsight-install-spark] for instructions on how to use cluster customization to install and use Spark on HDInsight Hadoop clusters.
trans-unit.target: [Install and use Spark on HDInsight clusters][hdinsight-install-spark] for instructions on how to use cluster customization to install and use Spark on HDInsight Hadoop clusters.

trans-unit.source: Spark is an open-source parallel processing framework that supports in-memory processing to boost the performance of big-data analytic applications.
trans-unit.target: Spark is an open-source parallel processing framework that supports in-memory processing to boost the performance of big-data analytic applications.

trans-unit.source: [Install R on HDInsight clusters][hdinsight-install-r] provides instructions on how to use cluster customization to install and use R on HDInsight Hadoop clusters.
trans-unit.target: [Install R on HDInsight clusters][hdinsight-install-r] provides instructions on how to use cluster customization to install and use R on HDInsight Hadoop clusters.

trans-unit.source: R is an open-source language and environment for statistical computing.
trans-unit.target: R is an open-source language and environment for statistical computing.

trans-unit.source: It provides hundreds of built-in statistical functions and its own programming language that combines aspects of functional and object-oriented programming.
trans-unit.target: It provides hundreds of built-in statistical functions and its own programming language that combines aspects of functional and object-oriented programming.

trans-unit.source: It also provides extensive graphical capabilities.
trans-unit.target: It also provides extensive graphical capabilities.

trans-unit.source: [Install Solr on HDInsight clusters](hdinsight-hadoop-solr-install.md).
trans-unit.target: [Install Solr on HDInsight clusters](hdinsight-hadoop-solr-install.md).

trans-unit.source: Use cluster customization to install Solr on HDInsight Hadoop clusters.
trans-unit.target: Use cluster customization to install Solr on HDInsight Hadoop clusters.

trans-unit.source: Solr allows you to perform powerful search operations on data stored.
trans-unit.target: Solr allows you to perform powerful search operations on data stored.
